params.name: username
params.desc: The username of the Keystore user that controls the new account

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user that controls the new account

params.name: subnetID
params.desc: Optional. Either a {@link https://github.com/feross/buffer|Buffer} or an cb58 serialized string for the SubnetID or its alias.

params.name: vmID
params.desc: The ID of the Virtual Machine the blockchain runs. Can also be an alias of the Virtual Machine.

params.name: FXIDs
params.desc: The ids of the FXs the VM is running.

params.name: name
params.desc: A human-readable name for the new blockchain

params.name: genesis
params.desc: The base 58 (with checksum) representation of the genesis state of the new blockchain. Virtual Machines should have a static API method named buildGenesis that can be used to generate genesisData.
